entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:29 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
